pageProduct.name: Swisse Glucosamine Sulfate 1500mg 180 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultiboost Glucosamine Sulfate is a premium quality formula to help relieve symptoms of mild osteoarthritis, support joint mobility, and help maintain joint cartilage health.

Mild Osteoarthritis Symptom Relief: Osteoarthritis is characterised by the breakdown of the protective cartilage within joints. Glucosamine is one of the building blocks of cartilage and helps to maintain joint cartilage health. Glucosamine sulfate also helps relieve mild joint pain and inflammation associated with osteoarthritis of the knee.

Joint Health & Mobility: Glucosamine sulfate helps support joint health, mobility and flexibility by relieving mild joint stiffness.

Joint Cartilage Health: Glucosamine sulfate helps support joint cartilage health by protecting against the deterioration of cartilage - the connective tissue that cushions joints.

Clinically Tested Glucosamine Sulfate: Clinical trials demonstrate positive results for the symptomatic relief of mild osteoarthritis with glucosamine sulfate.

Swisse Ultiboost Glucosamine Sulfate has been formulated based on scientific evidence to provide a clinically tested form of glucosamine in a convenient, one-a-day dose.

Warnings

If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare practitioner. Derived from seafood. The recommended daily dose of this medicine contains 151.8 mg of sodium.

Ingredients

EACH TABLET CONTAINS:

GLUCOSAMINE SULFATE (from glucosamine sulfate-sodium chloride complex 1.88 g) 1.5 g

Directions

ADULT DOSAGE:

One tablet daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30 degrees Celsius. Do not use if cap seal is broken.
